name: Dokapon DX: Wataru Sekai wa Oni Darake
name_original: Dokapon DX: Wataru Sekai wa Oni Darake
description: Dokapon DX: Wataru Sekai wa Oni Darake (ドカポンDX 〜わたる世界はオニだらけ〜) is a 2003 action video game developed and published by Asmik Ace Entertainment exclusively in Japan for the Nintendo GameCube on April 10, 2003, and later for the PlayStation 2 on July 8, 2004.
